title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O’Reilly, Gavin McInnes, & Megyn Kelly | 10/23/20
description:
Bill O’Reilly returns to give Glenn and Stu his thoughts on the final presidential debate and whether Trump managed to convince anyone that Biden is corrupt. Vice Media co-founder Gavin McInnes discusses the Left’s obsession with the Proud Boys and dispel the media’s myths. Megyn Kelly lays into the media's biased coverage of the Hunter Biden scandal and Trump’s "60 Minutes" interview.
